description: A gitbook plugin to show image by lightbox.

jquery.description: If you don't want to use plugin built-in jquery, set it to false.

name: gitbook-plugin-lightbox

scripts.build: npm run babel && npm run copy:jquery && npm run copy:lightbox
scripts.copy:lightbox: npm run copy:lightbox-css && npm run copy:lightbox-js && npm run copy:lightbox-img
scripts.docs: gitbook install book && gitbook build book docs
